Description:
Terrific Terrace living!
Youll love:
This modern 2-storey, 2-bedroom terrace boasting spacious low-maintenance living in the heart of the Sands Estate & comes with exclusive resort lifestyle benefits like use of an outdoor pool, tennis court & more.
The light & breezy flow of the open plan kitchen, living & dining area on the ground floor and how the private courtyards at either end ideally capture both the morning & afternoon sun.
Other quality features such as the Caesarstone benchtops & SMEG appliances in the kitchen, plus the ducted heating & cooling throughout.
Plus:
Both bedrooms are full-sized & feature generous robes the master with ensuite, WIRs & a private balcony.
Upstairs also features the main bathroom plus a European laundry; while downstairs has a separate powder room with additional storage options located on both levels.
Theres undercover parking for 1 car, plus an outdoor storage shed & additional parking for visitors too.
Located an easy walk from Peppers Resort & the beach this property will suit buyers looking for an affordable & low-maintenance lifestyle, quality lock up & leave weekender or a great Airbnb investment opportunity!

Description:
Solid brick home on 639m2.
Currently tenanted until November 2020.
Key features of home:
- 4 Bedrooms + study
- 639m2 north facing backyard
- Original condition ideal for renovation
Positioned within walking distance to shops, schools and parks, this solid brick home is set on a generous 639m2 block. Perfect for the growing family the home consists of 4 large bedrooms plus an open study, main living area, rumpus room and open dining in kitchen . The front living area and the study both have polished floor boards. The massive family kitchen is in original, yet good condition. The rumpus room to the back of the home opens out onto the north facing undercover outdoor entertainment area overlooking the generous yard. Also, the single garage has room for a workshop. This property is a great investment. Don't wait, this won't last long.

Description:
Key location oozing character & charm.
IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING COVID-19:
Open for inspections will no longer be scheduled for the public. To organise your own private viewing, please contact Matthew Constantine on 0401 393 993 or Matthew Hunt on 0433 176 611.
Please check our Head Office guidelines below before meeting with one of our agents or before viewing a property by appointment.
Visit: https://www.barryplant.com.au/cms/document/view/118/COVID-19_Online_Information_v2.pdf for more information.
Perfect for the lifestyle seeking downsizer wanting quality accommodation in a most convenient position or the savvy first home buyer seeking a foothold into the Belmont market this is one not to be missed. Located within close proximity to a range of services this is a lifestyle location for now and well into the future.
Consisting of three bedrooms, renovated central bathroom, open plan living, kitchen and dining area, leading you to the undercover outdoor entertaining area perfect for all year round use. Rounding out this sensational offering is the immaculately maintained and landscaped gardens throughout. Features include split system A/C, dishwasher, electric oven, gas cook top, bigger than expected four car garage and garden shed. Positioned on approx. 586 sqm this block allows you plenty of off street parking for cars, caravans or trailers.
Well positioned within easy distance to High Street Shopping, Roslyn Primary School, Belmont High School, Highton Village, public transport, Waurn Ponds Shopping, Aquatic Centre and the Ring Road making day to day living a breeze. Major investment in the area including the ever expanding Deakin University and the Epworth Hospital underpins your investment and ensures that this is lifestyle central!

Description:
Fashionably renovated with flawless positioning.
Sale by SET DATE 17/4/2020 (unless sold prior)
***Appointments via private inspection only. Please call Mitchell Falzon at any time to schedule a viewing.***
Presenting to you this beautifully renovated home located only minutes away from the Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre. This is the perfect opportunity for first home buyers, investors, upsizers and other buyers alike.
Upon entry you'll find 4 well-sized bedrooms, all with built-in robes and the master complimented by its own ensuite. A stunning central bathroom awaits, a separate laundry, two generously sized living areas, a dining room and at the heart of any home, the updated kitchen.
Additional features to the home include:
- Brand new floating floors throughout;
- Ceiling fans;
- Split system air conditioning;
- Gas heater;
- An undercover alfresco area perfect for entertaining all year round; and
- Shed perfect to store all your DIY accessories.
All major amenities are in close proximity such as numerous schools for all ages, health and fitness facilities, public transport, as well as parks, shops and Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre. Easily accessed by Torquay Road is the Geelong CBD and the Great Ocean Road. Finally, the Geelong Ring Road will have you straight to Melbourne.
Don't wait for another missed opportunity.

Description:
Private Inspections Available
A Rare Opportunity to Secure Two Units On One Title!
Presenting two units upon a spacious 842m2 (approx.) block, this is the ultimate investment opportunity! Whether you plan to lease both homes, or to live in one while you lease the other, this is an opening not to be missed. This property also offers an ideal set-up for those with family members who enjoy their independence but still need to be close to the primary caregivers.
Positioned in a quiet pocket of Leopold, this location places you within walking distance to public transport and the Leopold Sportsmans Club. The Highland Milk Bar is also a short stroll away, along with access to the Bellarine Rail Trail. A short drive will place you at the Leopold P.S and Gateway Plaza - putting the practical elements in place for families of all ages!
Set upon such a large block, both units are positioned to maximise privacy. Both floorplans consist of a generous living/dining/kitchen zone, three bedrooms with built-in robes, bathroom, separate toilet, and a laundry with external access. The kitchens take care of all your cooking needs with a built-in pantry and cooking appliances (oven, gas hob, rangehood).
In the front unit, a split-system air conditioner and ceiling fans provide modern comfort. The secure backyard will delight with gorgeous gardens and a veggie/herb patch. The small alfresco features a café blind to protect from the elements - meaning you can enjoy this beautiful outdoor setting all year long. The remote single lock-up garage provides secure parking.
The rear unit features a split-system air conditioner, gas wall heater, and a ceiling fan. The sheltered alfresco puts the foundations in place for casual outdoor living while flowing onto the generous yard. Caravan owners will instantly see the appeal in creating vehicle access to the grassy yard! The remote single lock-up garage provides secure parking.
Rarely does an opening like this arise in the property market! Youll need to act quickly to secure this unique opportunity!

Description:
Move Straight In Or Invest
This stunning as new townhouse boasts inner city flair and style while being tucked away in a private and secluded location with views over Geelong. Built to the highest quality and featuring a versatile floor plan while only minutes to the Ring Road and Deakin University. The ultra- modern kitchen overlooks a spacious sun filled family/meals area and boasts a walk- in pantry, stainless appliances and stone bench tops. A second downstairs living zone opens onto a secure rear yard while all three bedrooms have built in robes, the master boasts a walk in robe and en suite. Extras include split system heating and cooling for all year-round climate control, a double remote garage with internal access, stylish bathrooms and low maintenance gardens. Positioned in a prestigious locale close to walking tracks and sporting facilities, this gorgeous home ticks all the boxes. An ideal investment opportunity, professional couple abode or down sizer.
- Currently leased at $480 per week - over 4% return
- Move in or invest - the choice is yours
- Versatile floor plan with separate living areas
- Designer kitchen with stone benches and walk-in pantry
- Three bedrooms with robes, master with walk-in robe
- Generous sun-filled open plan living with views
- Quality fittings throughout. Ample storage
- Split system heating and cooling
- Double garage with remote door and internal access
- Easy commute to Melbourne via the Ring Road
- First Homebuyers Grant applies to qualified applicants
Internal area
196.18m²

Description:
Outstanding Potential
Occupying a generous corner allotment of 609sqm (approx.) in a quiet pocket of an ever-growing suburb. This quaint home presents incredible value and a timely opportunity for first homebuyers wanting to put their own stamp on something or those in search of a property to redevelop (STCA).
The traditional floor plan starts with the formal lounge as you enter with direct access to the private patio. Step through from here to the central kitchen and large family meals area, filled with natural light.
Completing the home is three well-sized bedrooms, all serviced by the functional main bathroom. In addition a separate bungalow to be used as you so desire.
Well located, you will find yourself only a short drive to both the Geelong CBD and Bellarine Peninsula and only moments from all the action of the Leopold Shopping Centre that will cater to all you daily needs.
Features include:
DLUG
Single carport
Gas heater

Description:
Tranquil Court Location
Positioned in a quiet and convenient court location within walking distance to Dorothy Street shopping strip, Allanvale Pre School, public transport and health services.
This immaculate home provides convenient living in a brilliant location. Set amongst delightful gardens and occupying a large allotment of 840m2 (approx.). This beautiful residence is ready and waiting for new owners to call it home.
Offering three generous sized bedrooms, two posing built in robes. The central bathroom has been tastefully updated showcasing fresh white tiles, a quality frameless shower recess, new vanity and bath.
Take your pick of two separate living zones, you can enjoy the main dining & living space, spacious and light filled with a cozy gas fire place, reverse cycle split system air conditioner and lovely bay window overlooking a leafy garden. While the family room located towards the back of the home enjoys the pleasant views back to Geelong and towards Corio Bay which are particularly stunning at night. French doors between the two living areas can be opened up to provide a very large open plan living room for entertaining with the entire family or be closed off for privacy & relaxing.
The contemporary kitchen features ample laminated cupboards and loads of bench space, stainless steel Bosch appliances, dishwasher and glass splash back.
Outdoors is just as impressive, there is no limit of space, with a large, private yard offering an impressive balcony perfect for entertaining, garden shed for extra storage, expansive paved outdoor living area complete with big built in bench seat and firepit. Car accommodation is provided in the large, remote controlled single garage.
Set in a beautiful court you have the sense of private living with the convenience of the central location only an easy walk to the Leopold primary school and facilities. Come and see this gem for yourself!

Description:
Magnificent Malishev below replacement cost!
At just 2 years young, this magnificent Q by Malishev home is the one you've been hoping for!
Beyond the impressive façade and incredible street presence, quality meets you at every turn all-the-while being incredibly functional. It's clear that every detail has been very well thought-out during the design phase and has been executed to perfection.
An abundance of natural light, raised ceilings, timber flooring and a warm but neutral colour palette combine to create a real sense of calm throughout. Multiple living zones provide space for everyone to enjoy, and a separate study is perfect whether doing home work or working from home. The scale of the rooms is really noticeable - no shoebox bedrooms here!
The superb kitchen is complete with large butler's pantry, Siemens pyrolytic oven and combination induction/gas cooktop, Qasair rangehood and a Miele dishwasher that automatically opens when the cycle is complete to ensure complete dry - genius!
Luxurious fittings and fixtures extend to the bathrooms also, featuring highly regarded names such Villeroy and Boch, Grohe and Kado Lux.
Double-glazing throughout, zoned reverse-cycle heating and cooling and a Jetmaster gaslog fire provide for year-round quiet comfort.
Multiple decks provide somewhere to enjoy a book outside regardless of the weather, while incredibly low maintenance gardens mean you can spend your weekends doing what you love.
Do the maths on replacing this incredible home and there is NO WAY you would build!
Call now to avoid disappointment.
Internal area
325m²

Description:
Treat Your Family To The Lifestyle Youve Been Dreaming Of!
Treat your family to the lifestyle youve been dreaming of in a riverside pocket of Highton! The kitchen showcases soaring views over the Fyansford hills, while the north-facing backyard creates a generous play space for children and pets alike!
With both the Barwon River and Queens Park within walking distance, this location is simply superb. The Queens Park Golf Course and sporting grounds will keep the whole family active, along with the rivers walking trails. The scenic Buckley Falls lookout is moments away, while the nearby Barrabool Hills Shopping Plaza takes care of all your shopping needs. Families will appreciate easy access to a selection of schools, including Newtowns private colleges.
Its easy to see that this home has been well-loved over the years, with interiors exuding a breezy ambience throughout. The formal dining area flows to the sunken lounge, which creates a cosy setting with a gas fireplace. The open plan kitchen/meals zone overlooks the backyard while also capturing north-facing views. Showcasing black reconstituted granite benchtops and white cabinetry, the kitchen oozes classic style. A built-in pantry provides ample storage, while appliances include a dishwasher, oven, gas hob, and rangehood.
Overlooking the front garden via dual block-out blinds, the Master Bedroom features mirrored built-in robes and an en suite. Two additional bedrooms boast built-in robes, while the office provides versatility as a 4th bedroom. The main bathroom, separate toilet, and European laundry complete the layout. Modcons include an alarm system, gas wall heater, and two split-system air conditioners. Surrounded by lush gardens and a fishpond, the partly-sheltered alfresco provides a peaceful spot to kick back and relax. Established gardens surround the secure backyard, while under-house storage is another huge plus. The double carport provides parking, while the single lock-up garage has been converted into a multi-purpose room with a loft. Whether you want to park your car securely or set up the room as the ultimate kids play space, this garage will effortlessly accommodate.
Putting the elements in place for a superb family lifestyle, this home will delight! Inspect ASAP!
Insights: 14 Maidie Street, Highton VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 108 other 4 bedroom house in Highton have recently been sold.

Description:
Stylish & Spacious On Summit
Nestled in a quiet locale with plenty of infrastructure nearby is this fantastic renovated four bedroom brick home with definite all round "wow" factor that will undoubtedly impress all young couples/families looking to secure something you can lovingly "call home".
On entry to the left is the first living area with open fire place with impressive messmate façade which is a theme throughout. Immediately inviting and functional, the wall in this living room will be able to cater for any size flat screen TV that the future may bring.
The master bedroom features a large walk in robe and renovated ensuite. Walk further into the house to discover the remaining well sized bedrooms with built in robes on the northern wing while the main bathroom and laundry sit opposite. The sheer size and cabinet space within the laundry means storage requirements will never be an issue. A clothes drying cupboard is also a distinguishing feature in this area. The double vanity in the main bathroom with further messmate façade finishes stylistically impress. Next be blown away by the beautiful open plan kitchen, living and dining area. A 900mm oven and long bench top are staples here of the modern quality kitchen. The nearby outdoor deck is perfect for entertaining and the flat hedge lined back yard is perfect for pets or kids to play in. The double lock up garage is easily accessed from the open plan living area inside the house. A split system in the open plan living a ducted heating throughout take care of temperature needs.
Perfectly positioned close to Quality Schools, High St Shops, Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre, Leisurelink Aquatic Centre, Deakin University, Epworth Hospital, Highton Village and the M1 taking you to Melbourne in under an hour. With a prime location and a great house on offer, this special offering on Summit Ave demands a private inspection today!
Insights: 74 Summit Avenue, Belmont VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 53 other 4 bedroom house in Belmont have recently been sold.

Description:
Downsize without compromise!
It's not often single level homes with flat backyards come up in this part of Highton, so this one is sure to be popular - particularly with those whose knees and hips aren't what they used to be!
Cleverly positioned at the front of this custom home, your master bedroom includes a Jack and Jill WIR, dual vanity ensuite with oversized shower and separate toilet - like it should be. The adjacent lounge is a great breakout space when you need some 'me time', while the large study is ideal for - let's be serious, most of us right now - to work from home.
Hardwood timber flooring leads you down the hallway to the open-plan kitchen, dining and living enjoying the benefits of both the rising and falling sun. The positioning of the large island bench makes for a great command-post whether you're preparing meals or entertaining. Two sets of sliding doors extend the space onto the alfresco, which is complete with glass balustrade and quality outdoor blinds providing for all weather use (and protection from the prevailing Westerly!).
The other two large bedrooms each have built-in robes and desks, perfect for kids of all ages. They share a central bathroom and separate toilet.
There's heaps of storage inside the home, while the oversized garage easily accommodates two large cars and all your other 'stuff'. A rear roller door to the garage means you can tuck the trailer or bikes away safely.
The north-facing flat backyard is heaven for your babies, be they two or four-legged. Choose whether to set and forget with the low maintenance garden or bring out the inner green thumb.
A reminder that inspections are now by appointment only - call now to avoid disappointment!
Internal area
287m²

Description:
Immaculate Family Home That Ticks Every Box!
If youre looking for a family home that ticks every box, then this is the one for you!
Convenience is key with a range of local amenities within close reach. The shops on the Surf Coast Highway provide you with a variety of supplies, while the Grovedale Hotel and Grovedale Recreation Reserve are both a short walk away. Families are taken great care of with Grovedale P.S within walking distance and Grovedale College just moments away. Public transport is an instant from your front door, while easy access to Marshall Train Station is ideal for Melbourne commuters.
With the interiors in immaculate condition, theres nothing left to do except move in and enjoy. The open plan living/dining/kitchen zone establishes the heart of the home, where the whole family can come together. The kitchen showcases classic style with black stone benchtops and white cabinetry. The walk-in pantry provides ample storage, while stainless steel appliances include a 900mm oven, gas hob, rangehood, and SMEG dishwasher. The lounge creates another generous area for relaxation, away from the hustle and bustle of the main living zone.
Zoned to the front of the home, the spacious Master Bedroom features a walk-in robe and en suite with shower, single vanity, and toilet. Three additional bedrooms with built-in robes are all generously proportioned. The main bathroom, separate toilet, large laundry, and walk-in linen press complete the floorplan. Youll be in comfort all year long thanks to ducted heating, a split-system air conditioner, double-glazed windows and the added bonus of 24 solar panels.
The sheltered alfresco creates a tranquil setting that inspires outdoor living. The café blind grants you the option to create a shady retreat or soak up the western sunlight. Established gardens surround the home, while the generous backyard will delight young children. The garden shed provides plenty of storage. The remote double lock-up garage features internal access.
Dont miss this opportunity to embrace spacious family living in a convenient locale! Enquire today!

Description:
Contemporary first home, sound investment.
IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING COVID-19:
Open for inspections will no longer be scheduled for the public. To organise your own private viewing, please contact Cam on 0406 597 050.
Please check our Head Office guidelines below before meeting with one of our agents or before viewing a property by appointment.
Visit: https://www.barryplant.com.au/cms/document/view/118/COVID-19_Online_Information_v2.pdf for more information.
Whether you're a first-home buyer, investor or even a downsizer, this low maintenance, modern home could be your first stepping stone, a brilliant addition to your portfolio or final real estate purchase.
This home comprises of three well-sized bedrooms, two offer built in robes, serviced by their own central bathroom with a separate toilet. The master is complete with its own generous walk-in robe & neat ensuite. Moving to the remainder of the home, you're presented with the second living and open plan kitchen, living & dining area, flooded with natural light & access to the immaculate rear yard, where entertaining friends and family all year round is a breeze. The undercover deck is the perfect spot for hosting BBQ's and special occasions. Additional features include 2550mm ceiling heights, central ducted heating, ceiling fans, alarm and video intercom systems, air-conditioning split system, built in ducted vacuum and a double lock up garage.
Location is impeccable. In less than 15 minutes you can be in the Geelong CBD, Waurn Ponds Shopping mecca or a 3 minute drive can have you waiting to catch the train to the Melbourne CBD from the Marshall train station. All daily amenities including quality schooling, shops, cafes, restaurants, gyms & entertainment are within easy reach.
Be sure to check out the 3D Virtual Tour!
Please contact us to schedule your private inspection.
Insights: 16 Werner Avenue, Marshall VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 28 other 3 bedroom house in Marshall have recently been sold.

Description:
Private, Secure & Convenient
Experience the excitement of coming home to this beautifully presented property in the heart of Highton. Whether youre downsizing, investing or your taking your first jump into the property market, this home caters for all.
The fresh contemporary spaces set the tone for a desirable lifestyle, while the property is perfectly positioned at the rear of the block this inviting abode offers three spacious bedrooms (master with full ensuite) including built in robes. The living spaces will be admired with an open plan kitchen looking onto the light filled living & dining areas and offering easy outdoor access to a private tree-lined courtyard. Located at the rear of the home is the family bathroom while the laundry and separate toilet is positioned adjacent.
The north facing alfresco area is perfect for all occasions; its undercover, private and quite spacious. Other features include a double lock up remote garage with dive through capability and offering internal access, split system air conditioning and gas heating makes for comfortable living.
This affordable home is perfectly positioned in a favourable location offering a faultless backdrop, all set within a short distance to cafes and eateries, The Epworth Hospital, Deakin University, primary and secondary schools and the Geelong CBD.
An inspection is a must!
Insights: 2/54 Daly Boulevard, Highton VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 138 other 3 bedroom house in Highton have recently been sold.

Description:
A spectacular secluded sanctuary awaits
Youll love:
Taking in the ocean & treetop views from this secluded sanctuary thats perched on a 5218m2 allotment in one of Jan Jucs most prized positions.
The spacious floorplan boasting high ceilings throughout; with 5 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and multiple living areas over 2 stunning levels.
Entertaining and relaxing in the spectacular pool & spa area that also features a large outdoor fireplace.
The wealth of floor-to-ceiling windows that flood the stylish interiors with warm natural light all day long.
Plus:
The ground floor master bedroom has an ensuite, WIRs & a beautiful leafy view out over the pool area.
The alfresco dining area off the main kitchen/living room includes a built-in BBQ, sink & a hot/cold shower.
Theres multiple landscaped green spaces that surround this Mark Gleeson designed and built home
Other features include a split system in the main downstairs living area, plus ceiling fans in 4 bedrooms & excellent cross-ventilation throughout to capture the sea breeze.

Description:
Please Contact Us to Book a Private Inspection
This wonderfully presented brick veneer home on 548sqm (approx.) boasts quality finishes and spacious living throughout. Situated in a sought after pocket of Marshall, it's the perfect family home, ideally suiting first home buyers, investors and downsizers. Featuring a spacious and light filled open plan living, bi-folds doors open to an undercover decked area which is fantastic for entertaining and family barbeques, the functional kitchen is complete with stone benchtops, walk-in pantry, gas cooking and dishwasher, the rumpus room provides a secondary living space, sizable home office, main bedroom with walk-in robe and ensuite with double vanity, a further two bedrooms both with built-in robes share a family bathroom and the double garage includes handy internal access. Outside the home is surrounded by neatly landscaped gardens with plenty of yard for the kids to play. Extra comforts include central heating and evaporative cooling throughout. Conveniently located close to the Marshall train station, schools, local shops and easy access to the Bellarine Peninsula and Geelong CBD. This stunning home must be inspected to be appreciated!
Insights: 40 MacFarlane Street, Marshall VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 28 other 3 bedroom house in Marshall have recently been sold.
